title: salahO viTTala
sahitya:
salahO viTTala svAmi nammana viTTala jagadantaryAmi


caraNam 1    yeDega viTTala balake viTTala yeDega balake viTTala tande viTTala tAyi viTTala tandetAyi
    caraNam 2    bandhu viTTala baLaga viTTala bandhubalaGa viTTala hinde viTTala munde viTTala hindemunde purandara viTTala
